summary: WHEN A LEFT TURN WAS MADE, THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED UP.      *JB  CONSUMER HAD TO JERK TO THE RIGHT TO BREAK LOOSE THEN THE TURN SIGNALS WOULD NOT CANCEL.  BROKEN MULTIFUNCTION SWITCH REPLACED.  AIR CONDITIONER INOPERATIVE.  DEALER REPLACED LEAKING EVAPORATOR.  FASCIAS AND REAR SLIDING DOOR DAMAGED, DIRTY.           *TT
